r.d: SQLite3 is a PHP extension for use with the SQLite database system. This extension bundles SQLite 3.5.7 though the minimum requirement is 3.3.9.
r.n: - Upgraded bundled SQLite to 3.5.7 - Added SQLite3::lastErrorCode and SQLite3::lastErrorMsg - Added SQLite3_result::columnType to get type of a column in a result set - Added flags to SQLite3::open to allow databases to be opened read only. (PHP 5.3+ for now) - Fixed incorrect column count being returned on a non executed statement - Fixed lack of library when using the shared sqlite3
